name: Minnya de Ghost Hunter
overview: Minnya de Ghost Hunter let you grab your spirit seeking kit and hunt for ghosts, spooks and phantoms in this action-board game. The player controls a ghost hunter that enters different kind of mazes and using a board game gameplay he advances different squares and in some of those square there are mini games like bingo, find the wrong picture, find the wrong element, etc. Winning a mini game will gain the player more points and cards that he can use to throw an exact number in the dice, (for example a card with a number 5 will allow your character to move 5 squares) until he reaches the level boss if he defeats him the story will advance. To defeat the ending level boss the player have to press to stop the bar during the blue part or he will lose the game. Advancing in the game the player will have to fight with other ghost hunters controlled by the computer (up to 3 computer players in the same board).
